thread.section_title: webuyanycar.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of webuyanycar.com | webuyanycarusa.com
thread.title: Lauren

author: Lauren
title: Lauren
text: I dealt with Fred at the Willow Grove, PA branch. Fred is extremely professional, while friendly at the same time. He is very considerate of customers' privacy, and conscientious about customers' property. He was so thorough - he thought of everything. He really has a deep understanding of best in class customer service. I got the exact amount that had been Quote: d to me online, although I was convinced it would be a bait-and-switch deal. I highly recommend Webuyanycar.com, and if you are in the vicinity, definitely go to the Willow Grove branch and talk to Fred!
